source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT [EventId]
      ,[ModelName]
      ,[EventName]
      ,[RefreshId]
      ,[EventStatus]
	FROM [AZUREDB].[DB01].[Controls].[ADFRefreshQueue] EQ
	INNER JOIN [Dimensions].[Days] DT ON [DT].[ActualDate] = CAST([EQ].[CreateDateTime] AS date)
	WHERE [EQ].[EventName] = 'Nightly_End'
	  AND [EQ].[EventStatus] = 'C'
	  AND [EQ].[ModelName] = 'Orders'
	  AND [DT].[CurrentDayOffset] = 0
)
THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS 'OrdersNightlyRun'
